WorkItem.Description:
The first stop in the Part of the tutorial is to create a new controller named StoreManagerController with the following options:

Template:
Controller with read/write actions and views, using Entity Framework

Model Class:
Album (MvcMusicStore.Models)

Data Context Class:
MusicStoreEntities (MvcMusicStore.Model)

I have followed the tutorial step by step and have not run into any errors except when I try and create this Controller. 

The error that I am getting is as follows:
![Image](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/43dfde_8f9bda47830f421caa5a4506db165152.png/v1/fill/w_450,h_195,al_c/43dfde_8f9bda47830f421caa5a4506db165152.png)

Any help with this would be great as I am really trying to learn as much as I can with this tutorial and can't seem to get past this part.

Comments.Message: I am facing the same problem, so pls guide us.
I am facing the exact problem, so please help.

I am also a problem during addition of StoreManagerController. After i Set the options for the Add Controller dialog as in pdf on pg.55 and click on ADD i receive the following error..

Error Popup:

Unable to retrieve Metadata for 'MVCMusicStore.Models.Album'. Using the same DbCompiledModel to create contexts against different types of database servers is not supported. Instead, create a separate DbCompiledModel for each type of server being used.
